item.title: KubeDB Overview
item.description: KubeDB by AppsCode Kubernetes has emerged as the de-facto way to deploy modern containerized apps on cloud or on-premises. “Despite all that growth on the application layer, the data layer hasn’t gotten as much traction with containerization” - Google. That’s not surprising, since handling things like state (the database), availability to other layers of the application, and redundancy for a database makes it challenging to run a database in a distributed environment like Kubernetes.
